text: Chamara Repiyallage (born 10 May 1992) is a Sri Lankan judoka. He competed at the 2016 Summer Olympics in the men's 73 kg event, in which he was eliminated in the third round by Lasha Shavdatuashvili. ==References== Category:1992 births Category:Living people Category:Sri Lankan male judoka Category:Olympic judoka of Sri Lanka Category:Judoka at the 2016 Summer Olympics Category:Judoka at the 2014 Commonwealth Games Category:Judoka at the 2018 Asian Games Category:Asian Games competitors for Sri Lanka
title: Chamara Repiyallage
